Class ThemeManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.theme.ThemeManager
public final class ThemeManager extends Object
Manages the active theme of the application. Follows the Singleton pattern to provide global access to the current theme. Uses the Observer pattern via JavaFX properties to notify listeners of theme changes.

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<Theme>
    currentTheme
    Gets the current theme property.

  • Property Details

    • currentTheme

      public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<Theme> currentThemeProperty
      Gets the current theme property. UI components can bind to or listen to this property.
      See Also:
      • getCurrentTheme()
      • currentThemeProperty()

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ThemeManager getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of the ThemeManager.
      Returns:
      the ThemeManager instance

    • registerTheme

      public void registerTheme(Theme theme)
      Registers a theme and adds it to the rotation. If it's the first theme, it becomes the active theme.
      Parameters:
      theme - the theme to register

    • cycleTheme

      public void cycleTheme()
      Cycles to the next available theme.

    • currentThemeProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<Theme> currentThemeProperty()
      Gets the current theme property. UI components can bind to or listen to this property.
      Returns:
      the ObjectProperty containing the current Theme
      See Also:
      • getCurrentTheme()

    • getCurrentTheme

      public Theme getCurrentTheme()
      Gets the currently active theme.
      Returns:
      the active Theme
